imdb.plot outline: A varied group of musicians are brought together to express their musical backgrounds and musical styles while being introduced to another group who is widely different in style from themselves. During the series the two groups are introduced to each other and are asked to perform a mutually agreed piece of music that by the end of the show they will perform together. Showing that their is one common thread that joins us all together; Music and the arts.
imdb.title: New South Crossings
plot: A varied group of musicians are brought together to express their musical backgrounds and musical styles while being introduced to another group who is widely different in style from themselves. During the series the two groups are introduced to each other and are asked to perform a mutually agreed piece of music that by the end of the show they will perform together. Showing that their is one common thread that joins us all together; Music and the arts.::M. Smedley
